lead_paragraph: The head of General Electric GE.N said on Wednesday talks with the French government on its offer for Alstom's ALSO.PA energy assets had been "productive" and expressed confidence that the deal would go through despite a potential rival offer from Germany's Siemens SIEGn.DE.

headline.main: GE Says Talks With France on Alstom Productive, to Boost Jobs
headline.print_headline: GE Says Talks With France on Alstom Productive, to Boost Jobs
